featured.text: At the close of the 15th century, Europeans’ craze for spices gave rise to the Spice Route, a network of sea lanes joining Europe with the Far East, where most spices came from.
The Europeans brought wetas to New Zealand. 43.
Natural materials such as clay, shells, and ivory were used before trading with the Europeans in the 19th century.

definition.zh_def: 歐洲人，指來自歐洲的居民或民族。
definition.en_def: People from Europe or of European descent.
definition.example: Many Europeans enjoy traveling to different countries during their vacations.
